casebody.data:
Wytheville

C. C. Sanderlin v. Commonwealth of Virginia. June 9, 1941. Record No. 2426. A. A. Bangel, L. S. Parsons and Tom E. Gilman, for the plaintiff in error. Abram P. Staples, Attorney-General, and Walter E. Rogers, Special Assistant, for the Commonwealth. Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Hudgins, Gregory, Eggleston and Spratley, JJ.

Error to a judgment of the Circuit Court of Norfolk county. Hon. A. B. Carney, judge presiding.

Affirmed by equally divided court.
